group_1.textRight: End of the line!@[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][surround:2006A01][chara:200600:mouthOpen_1]Haaaaah!!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][surround:2006A04]I ain't satisfied yet...@Here's an extra serving for ya!!
Big Sis Kyoko...so cool...!

group_1.textLeft: You're not hurting anywhere, are you...?!@Sumomo!

group_1.textRight: I'm okay!@Just got a few scrapes...
I've already given her first-aid.

group_1.textLeft: You've had a pretty horrible time of it, huh...@Jeez, I'm pretty pathetic myself.
Just because I let one Witch get away,@a few days ago...

group_1.textRight: No...I'm really thankful!@You've come to my rescue two times now!
I...made sure to keep my promise.
I told him that no matter how many wishes I might@have, I'll never ask for miracles from anyone!

group_1.textLeft: Aah, smart girl!
Still...[chara:200652:lipSynch_0][wait:0.5][chara:200652:lipSynch_1]you went through some@ridiculous crap 'cause of that.

group_1.textRight: Honestly...
If you'd become a Magical Girl, you might have@been able to forge that path all on your own.

group_1.textLeft: You little shit...
Kyubey...you detected the presence of a Witch.
And even so, you purposefully led Miss Sumomo@into danger without warning her, didn't you?

group_1.textRight: If I said otherwise,@would it cause you to doubt me any less?
In any case, it seems that Sumomo's@resolve is unbreakable.
If she's decided for herself that@she will not form a contract...
Then from this point forward,@I will no longer appear before Sumomo.
Is that alright with you, Sumomo?

group_1.textLeft: Yep! That's fine with me!
...Can we really put our trust in that hairball?

group_1.textRight: We can...
He may withhold dangerous information from us,@but I think we can trust him to honor his word.

group_1.textLeft: I see, that's one relief at least.

group_1.textRight: ...Thank goodness!
If I ran into Kyubey again, I think I might@have had second thoughts next time.

group_1.textLeft: Hm...why's that?

group_1.textRight: Well...

group_1.textLeft: If we can't fill up the shop in time for Valentine's...

group_1.textRight: ...You'll have to move away?!

group_1.textLeft: Geeze, then we haven't got any time@to waste sittin' around here!
We've just gotta generate some more publicity@for the shop before Valentine's gets here!
Let's get back to the storefront, Sumomo!

group_1.textRight: O...[chara:801202:lipSynch_0][wait:0.1][chara:801202:lipSynch_1]Okay!
So many people...@What are they doing?

group_1.textCenter: They're in front of our shop...?

group_1.narration: "I'm so sorry for the inconvenience...!@We've been flooded with reservations, you see...@Reservations for our Chocolate Cakes are@being given out through a lottery drawing...!"
"We'll be handing out lottery tickets,@so please wait in an orderly line..."

group_1.textCenter: Oh...Kyoko and Homura?@Kind of a weird duo, huh...?

group_1.textLeft: If it ain't Sayaka.@What's up with all this commotion, huh?

group_1.textRight: Huh, you haven't heard yet?
Sugar Plum has become a huge sensation.

group_1.textLeft: Eehhh?!

group_1.textRight: They're being flooded with orders for their Valentine-themed Choco Cake!

group_1.textLeft: But why so suddenly...?!

group_1.textRight: Some big-name fashion model, apparently...
Word is that she visited this place recently@and ate something really delicious.
It sounded like she was talking@about this shop's Choco Cake!
...And now, we've got scouting agents and@such coming in who think it was this place.
I'm pretty sure there was an interview and some@other stuff about it in a 'BiBi' web article...

group_1.textLeft: Homura, did you know about any of this?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...[chara:200351:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:200351:lipSynch_1]ah, here it is!
Wait, Miss Yachiyo?!

group_1.textLeft: She's one of Kamihama's Magical Girls, isn't she?@To think that girl was such a hotshot celebrity!

group_1.textRight: Could it be...? I did tell Iroha@about the shop a little while ago...
And she replied that she'd like to check it out@with Miss Yachiyo and her friends soon...
And so they kindly paid the shop@a visit...I suppose?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, this pretty-looking lady...!
She was hanging around with all the@big girls from middle and high school!
So that lady was a supermodel!

group_1.textRight: ...So what now?@Kyoko called for me and Homura.
Then one of the Kamihama girls that Homura@talked to happened to be super-famous...
So now it's suddenly a Huge Prospering Business,@I guess?

group_1.textLeft: On that note...looks like they'll have no problem@securing a full shop on Valentine's Day, right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...and that means we won't@have to move away anymore!
Thanks so much, Big Sis Kyoko!@Miss Homura, Miss Sayaka!
I certainly must express my own gratitude as well.

group_1.textLeft: Dad...!

group_1.textRight: Why, if Sumomo and Miss Kyoko had never met,@right now we'd be...

group_1.textLeft: Nah...who do you think you should say that to?@Homura's the one who made it work out.
But I'm so happy for ya, Sumomo!@You carried out your family's dream.

group_1.textRight: [chara:801202:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yeah!
...A tiny miracle, wouldn't you say?
*Chuckle*
